description:
This market will resolve to the team that officially announces John Harbaugh has joined it in any professional coaching or football operations role (including, but not limited to, head coach, assistant coach, or senior football staff) by April 23, 2026, at 11:59 PM ET.

If John Harbaugh joins a professional team not listed as an option, this market will resolve to “Other”.

If John Harbaugh does not officially join any listed team by April 23, 2026, at 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to “Other”.

If John Harbaugh announces his official retirement or that he is joining a non-professional team by that time, this market will immediately resolve to “Other”.

Temporary roles, interim titles, or short-term appointments do count, provided they are officially announced as such.

The resolution source is a consensus of credible reporting.

events.title: John Harbaugh next team?

question: Will John Harbaugh join the New York Giants prior to April 23, 2026?
